name: PertussisTestsForBordetellaPertussisAntigen
title: Pertussis (Tests for Bordetella pertussis Antigen)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Bordetella pertussis antigen),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Pertussis Ag;  

LOINC search: “pertussis Ag -panel -donor -interpretation”),(Exclusion Criteria: panel tests)
